name: New Gmail w/ iOS-style Scrollbars - MAC & PC
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
*** NOW WORKS COMPLETELY ON WINDOWS W/ GMAIL AND GMAIL LABS *** FINALLY COMPATIBLE ON BOTH MAC AND PC!!! For those of us who have switched over to the new Gmail layout, this style tweaks a few items (e.g. Scrollbars and Remove the Ads).

user.name: DaveyJake
user.about: To find out more about me, your best bet to click on the link below aka my "homepage."

additional_info:
More features are coming really, REALLY soon! I originally made this style for a friend on her computer and didn't have enough time to finish which is I had to post before finishing. Check back often and let me know what you think!

+ CHANGELOG +
12/1 - Refined the scrollbars after looking closer at Lion's appearance
12/3 - Fixed chat bar list overflow
12/31 - Just in time for 2012; Now works on Mac & PC!
2/22 - Either Firefox or Google changed how the parts of the scrollbar are recognized. ALL BUGS ARE FIXED!! ALL IS WORKING AGAIN!!!
2/22 - Fine tuned PC version
9/11 - Updates to Google's code
